decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 1052 A 000 (Location Plan); 001 (Existing Site Plan); 011 (Proposed Multi Use Games Area Details); 012 Rev B (Cycle Store 1); 012 Rev B (Refuse Store 1); 014 Rev A (Buggy Stores 1 and 2 Plans and Elevations); 015 (Sub-station Plans and Elevations); 016 (Maintenance Store Plans and Elevations); 020 Rev A (Street Scene); 040 Rev A (Boundary Treatment Plan); 041 Rev A (Boundary Treatment Details); 001 Rev 01 (Figure 1 Woodman Road Tree Constraints Plan); 002 Rev H (Proposed Site Plan); 010 Rev D (Proposed Multi Use Games Area Plan and Elevations); 011 Rev B (Proposed Multi Use Games Area Details); S160330-101 Rev P (Ground Floor Blocks 1 and 2);  S160330-102 Rev P (First Floor Blocks 1 and 2); S160330-103 Rev P (Second Floor Blocks 1 and 2); S160330-301 Rev J (Proposed Elevations); Summary of Public Consultation on the Temporary Accommodation Schemes at Brocket Way and Woodman Road; Woodman Road Factual and Interpretive Ground Investigation Report (10016066-ARC-01-XX-RP-ZZ-0005-02) dated January 2019 prepared by Arcadis; Phase 2 Ground Investigation Report (Part 1); Phase 2 Ground Investigation Report (Part 2); Phase 2 Ground Investigation Report (Part 3); Woodman Road Drainage Strategy (10016066-ARC-01-XX-RP-CE-0001-01) dated January 2019 prepared by Arcadis; Woodman Road Flood Risk Assessment (10016066-ARC-01-XX-RP-CW-0002-01) dated January 2019 prepared by Arcadis; Energy Statement Land at Woodman Road, Chigwell, IG7 4BP; Tree Survey Report Woodman Road – Redbridge Temporary Accommodation dated November 2018; Sunlight Study Land at Woodman Road, Chigwell, IG7 4BP; L2A 2013 Design Stage Report Temp Living Accommodation dated January 2017 (reference TH/6172) prepared by Sutcliffe Consulting Engineers; Air Quality Assessment Land at Woodman Road, Chigwell (REC Reference: AQ106887R1) dated January 2019 prepared by REC; Ecological Assessment dated November 2018 prepared by Urban Green (Job no. 11924); Transport Assessment Proposed Temporary Family Housing, Woodman Road, Chigwell, dated January 2019 prepared by Croft (Job No. 2473); Woodman Road Phase 1 Geo Environmental Desk Study (10016066-ARC-02-XX-RP-ZZ-0001-01-Phase 1 Report – Woodman Road) dated September 2018 prepared by Arcadis (Part 1); Phase 1 Geo Environmental Desk Study (Part 2)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Variation of condition 1 of approved permission 0134/19: Alterations to storage of children's prams/buggies, cycle and refuse store and installation of electricity substation. (Summary) (AMENDED DESCRIPTION)
site_name: Open Space At Woodman Path And
